title: Role-Play-Based Translation Discussion Learning: Developing Professional Translation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading comprehension and general understanding of translation
context.additional_context: Beginner-level course focused on specialized translation in medical/legal/technical domains. Provides asynchronous collaborative learning environments using digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can accurately translate core concepts of specialized field (medical/legal/technical) texts through role-play discussions.
Learners develop the ability to evaluate and revise translation results through three or more stages based on collaborative feedback.
Learners proactively participate in role-play activities at least twice a week on the online discussion platform.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
